Class MoviePage

java.lang.Object
com.example.finalproject.model.MoviePage
public class MoviePage extends Object
Represents a scheduled showing of a specific movie in a specific room. Each showtime includes the movie being shown, the room, the date and time, and the number of tickets sold so far. Demonstrates encapsulation and input validation. Author: Brody

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MoviePage(long id, Movie movie, Room room, LocalDate date, LocalTime startTime)
    Creates a new Showtime instance with no tickets sold yet.

  • Constructor Details

    • MoviePage

      public MoviePage(long id, Movie movie, Room room, LocalDate date, LocalTime startTime)
      Creates a new Showtime instance with no tickets sold yet.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier, must be non-negative
      movie - movie being shown, cannot be null
      room - room used for the showtime, cannot be null
      date - date of the showtime, cannot be null
      startTime - start time of the showtime, cannot be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any required argument is invalid
